pages.title: Fake V3
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Fourze Special Event: Amanogawa High School Spring School Festival Special (2012, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:v3/devices/double_typhoon#fake_double_typhoon)Fake Double Typhoon$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed II$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost III$(li)Strength II
